com.googlecode.sarasvati.impl
Class AbstractGraph

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.sarasvati.impl.AbstractGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasEventQueue, Graph
Direct Known Subclasses:
HibGraph, MemGraph
public abstract class AbstractGraph
extends Object
implements Graph

Provides some base logic for getting input and output arcs for a given node. Works by iterating over the arcs and building the set of associated inputs and outputs. This happens once, the first time a set of input or output arcs are requested.

Author:
Paul Lorenz

getInputArcs

public List<Arc> getInputArcs(Node node)
Description copied from interface: Graph
Returns a list of arcs which have the given node as an end point. The list may be empty, but will never be null.

Specified by:
getInputArcs in interface Graph
Parameters:
node - A node belonging to this graph
Returns:
A list of arcs
